ratingmanager module¶

Module managing movie ratings.

class ratingmanager.RatingManager(cursor, conn)[source]¶

Bases: object

Class managing movie ratings in the database.

Parameters:

  • cursor (sqlite3.Cursor) – SQLite database cursor.

  • conn (sqlite3.Connection) – SQLite database connection.

add_or_update_rating(user_id, movie_id, rating)[source]¶

Adds or updates a movie rating by user.

Parameters:

  • user_id (int) – User ID.

  • movie_id (int) – Movie ID.

  • rating (float) – Movie rating (0.5-5.0).

Returns:

True if operation succeeded, False otherwise.

Return type:

bool

Raises:

sqlite3.Error – In case of database error.

delete_rating(user_id, movie_id)[source]¶

Deletes a movie rating.

Parameters:

  • user_id (int) – User ID.

  • movie_id (int) – Movie ID.

Raises:

sqlite3.Error – In case of rating deletion error.

get_movie_id_by_title(title)[source]¶

Retrieves movie ID by its title.

Parameters:

title (str) – Movie title.

Returns:

Movie ID or None if not found.

Return type:

int or None

get_rating(user_id, movie_id)[source]¶

Retrieves movie rating given by user.

Parameters:

  • user_id (int) – User ID.

  • movie_id (int) – Movie ID.

Returns:

Movie rating or 0 if not found.

Return type:

float

get_user_rated_movies(user_id)[source]¶

Retrieves all movies rated by user.

Parameters:

user_id (int) – User ID.

Returns:

List of tuples (movie title, rating).

Return type:

list[tuple]
